plot: After a young artist saves a girl from drowning, they fall in love. But her father opposes the match unless the young man can succeed in business. He does, and wins the lady.
title: Shui huo yuan yang
plot_es: After a young artist saves a girl from drowning, they fall in love. But her father opposes the match unless the young man can succeed in business. He does, and wins the lady.
plot_en: After a young artist saves a girl from drowning, they fall in love. But her father opposes the match unless the young man can succeed in business. He does, and wins the lady.
